ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] hello?
ygData.msgSnippet: Besides Banded you mean? A few months ago they added forged weaponry for us, but I asked the Tradeskills guy at EQCon a few weekends back about more armor,
ygData.messageBody:
Besides Banded you mean? A few months ago they added forged weaponry for us, but I asked the Tradeskills guy at EQCon a few weekends back about more armor, like steel maybe, and he said no way. Nor will we ever get enchanted smithed armor/weapons.

Shannyn t'Daisemi
Master Smith and proud of it



>>> "Joseph Kish" <kraeken@...> 03/13/00 05:13PM >>>
From: "Joseph Kish" <kraeken@...>

Is there anyone still on this list?

I've heard rumors of forged armor being in the game and am wondering
if anyone knows anything about it...

Thanks
